entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use Improvements in CMake Generator Expressions to Simplify our Build System's ones #93370
    9.0.0
  • Is it possible to get an Avalonia app published into the Apple iOS App Store? #93366
  • R2R Build perf: consider parallelizing `RunReadyToRunCompiler` in `_CreateR2RImages` #93364
  • ilverify error messages should better support nested types #93361
  • [ARM][.NET 7] - System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException on ThreadPool ctor #93356
  • Incorrect value in FirstDayOfWeek test #93354
  • Timeout on CurrentCulture_BasedOnLangEnvVar #93353
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf runs broken with `Generic Type Definition failed to init, due to: Inline array struct must have a single field. assembly:System.Private.Xml.dll type:<>y__InlineArray2`1 member:(null)` #93348
  • [wasm] JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes - System.ObjectDisposedException #93347
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Exponential blowup in VNForMapSelectWork #93342
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8.0 RC1 and RC2 lag spikes #93341
  • HttpClientHandler with PreAuthenticate enabled can't refresh expired password #93340
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ISpanScannable, IUtf8SpanScannable #93339
  • Configuration Binding source generator throws InvalidOperationException at runtime for type with custom [TypeConverter] use within a dictionary #93335
    9.0.0
  • superpmi-replay/superpmi-diffs fail with "No space left on device" #93332
  • Repo tag for v7.0.12 is for v7.0.11 #93328
  • Support PublishAot for Linux Docker on Windows with Docker Desktop natively #93327
  • Error with running or building on 7.0.401/2 #93325
  • System.IO.File.OpenRead - incorrect and misleading exception #93324
    Future
  • ThreadStartException in System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests on WASM #93323
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrashMainThread/ParallelCrashMainThread.sh #93321

Closed

  • [mono][perf] WASM disk size regression on 15 Nov 2022 #79598
    9.0.0
  • [browser] V8 System.Text.Json.Tests AOT assert - loader.c:1821, condition not met #89670
    9.0.0
  • [AOT][Blazor][Net8] Performance issue in async code #89733
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT compilation issue on IOS ARM64 - losing interface members? #92106
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent behavior between TimeProvider in .NET 8 and .NET 6 during testing #92264
    8.0.0
  • Jitted Methods Counting Test Fails When Hardware Intrinsics are Disabled #93261
    9.0.0
  • Configuration source generator should use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull if it's available #89879
    9.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89936
    9.0.0
  • [gcstress] LoadVector128x2SByte fails under gcstress #93230
    9.0.0
  • SSL_CERT_DIR should support multiple paths #91110
    9.0.0
  • XML Test/Validation for handling of w3.org redirect changes #74382
    Future
  • ReflectionTypeLoadException when interface is loaded from different locations #93013
  • Load X509Certificate2 with CreateFromPemFile #93319
  • Failures in SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3 test #74896
    9.0.0
  • Allow to allocate known eternal objects (especially buffers) #4369
    Future
  • Got Win32Exception when I send an HTTPS request #91464
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties.Index should be uint #93316
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/StructMarshalling/ReversePInvoke/MarshalSeqStruct/ReversePInvoke/ReversePInvokeTest/ReversePInvokeTest.sh #93166
    9.0.0
  • Enhance the retry after of System.Threading.RateLimiting #77991
    Future
  • Documenting .NET 8.0 APIs #88561
    8.0.0
  • Too many duplicate xxx.runtimeconfig.json #91238
    Future
  • blazor publish build fails #93279
  • JIT: Make JIT time constants from calls to Type methods and properties #4920
    Future
  • Unable to build dotnet/runtime source code locally with dot net framework 4.6.2 as target framework #91316
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: defer creating throw helper blocks until simple lower #93371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vector512 Support for Enumerable<int>.Min/Max #93369
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove `BBF_TRY_BEG` #93367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • wasm runtime tests debug #93365
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Fix CMD_OBJECT_REF_GET_VALUES_BY_FIELD_TOKEN behavior #93363
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Revert "Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions (#92029)" #93362
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [PERF] Update hybridglobalization case conversion to be POSIX Standard #93360
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Update workload description to include target framework #93359
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [PERF] Remove --experimental-wasm-eh argument from used wasm_args #93357
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #93355
    needs-area-label
  • Fix broken ECMA link #93351
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove duplicate semicolon in CSharpSyntaxUtilities.cs #93350
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Skip non virtual generic methods in build_imt_slots #93349
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Improve SpanHelpers.ClearWithReferences for arm64 #93346
    area-System.Memory
  • Use BigMul for 32x32=64 in decimal #93345
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix exponential blowup of memory dependency arrays in VNForMapSelectWork #93344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [docs][wasm] Merge duplicated wasm build instructions. #93343
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Report Exception.FullName for `http.client.request.duration/error.type` #93322
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix `MEASURE_MEM_ALLOC` build in Release #93358
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [8.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92986
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [6.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92988
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92987
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Skip Jitted Methods Counting Test when DOTNET_EnableHWIntrinsic=0 #93264
    test-bug, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 118.0.5993.70, windows: 118.0.5993.70 #93352
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Arm64: Implement LoadAndInsertScalar APIs #93197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix the test template for LoadVectorx* #93301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder #93115
    area-System.Reflection
  • [MT][browser] Disable new CI failures on library MT tests #93224
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #92920
    area-System.Security, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Enable DotNETRuntimePrivate provider #93245
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Clean up some ifdefs in EventSource #93287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Change Active Issue Number #93333
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix dropping NaN sign and payload when importing float constants #93285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Add wasmbrowser template startup measurements #93334
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.IndexOfXx corner-case when first element is seed value #93169
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Rename JitDisablePgo to JitDisablePGO #93320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some issues for CoreRoot test cases: #93187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix emitOutputLJ trying to encode large displacements #93312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use collection expression in foreach in CreateManifestAndDescriptors #93289
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Consolidate a few exception throws in TensorPrimitives #93168
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Remove a few unnecessary `unsafe` keyword uses in TensorPrimitives #93219
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Updated

  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make atomics `GenTreeIndir`-derived #93295
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge CoreMangLib, Exceptions and Interop folders #91901
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Change a few more uses of `new T[]` with a span to collection expressions #93292
    needs-area-label
  • Improve a vector implementation to support alignment and non-temporal tores #93296
    area-System.Numerics
  • [browser] streamline Task/Promise marshalling #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Cleaned up TlsSecret and added test. #93119
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Speed up calling interface methods #93100
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [android][ios] Fix dispose problem with NativeHttpHandlers (#93262) #93291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve disk full test #92682
    area-System.IO
  • Adjust the DNS lookup duration metric #93254
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
